newsitem.title: JAPAN: RESEARCH ALERT - Nippon Sharyo rated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Nippon Sharyo rated.

text.p: Ltd has assigned Nippon Sharyo Ltd a "B" rating, Daiwa
In its three-grade rating system, the research institute
assigns a "B" rating to issues whose values it sees
moving within 10 percentage points in either direction
of the Tokyo Stock Exchange first-section TOPIX index
